thread.section_title: SHOWER SEAL LTD Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.theshowerseal.co.uk | 2 of 395
thread.title: Alan Park
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by Alan Park

author: Alan Park
title: Alan Park
text: Very easy to use and navigate this site which is good to see at the moment. Some sites have so much going on it's difficult to see what your buying. The seals were perfect for my screens over my P shaped bath. Decent quality and easy to fit. Would have liked more delivery options as I wasn't in a hurry and didn't need next day delivery. They were just to replace older discoloured ones. Delivery was very good.got the usual text.Messages to keep me up to date. On the whole very good, I'll definitely recommend this site to friends and family.
